title: Chicken Dumpling Soup
description: Homemade chicken and dumplings made easy!
ingredients: 10.5 oz can cream of chicken soup
2-3 cups of shredded chicken (rotisserie chicken works well)
16.3 oz can refrigerated biscuits, each biscuit cut into pieces
instructions: 1. Add olive oil, onion, carrots, celery, garlic, thyme, salt, and pepper to Dutch oven or heavy saucepan. Heat on medium for 7 minutes, stirring occasionally.

2. Add chicken broth, chicken soup, water and shredded chicken. Increase heat to medium-high and bring to a boil. Reduce to a simmer and add biscuit pieces. Cover and simmer for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally. Top with parsley if desired, and serve warm.

title: Chicken Taco Bowl for 2
ingredients: 1 green bell pepper, finely chopped, remove seeds
Half rotisserie chicken shredded (or about 2 cups, thigh meat is best, no skin)
instructions: 1. Add 1 tbs coconut oil, peppers, and onion to pan
2. Heat pan on slightly higher than medium heat until onions are translucent and peppers are getting soft and losing some color, about 5 min
3. Mix fajita seasoning in with chicken then add chicken to veggies along w/other tsp of oil, mix well
5. Toss in a bowl, add cheese, avocado and top w/Sriracha
*Can also make this a breakfast scramble by adding beaten eggs a couple minutes after chicken and stirring to scramble them, but only cook them for about 1 minute

title: Chicken Pesto Pasta
ingredients: Jar of pesto (small Buitoni container is best
instructions: 1. Cook pasta and drain, then set back in pot or in ceramic container and add salt/pepper to taste
2. Heat up chicken in pan w/olive oil (or can heat in over: 475 for 10 min, on a plate covered in foil, while pasta is cooking)
3. Make spinach while pasta is cooking (takes 5 min)
4. Add chicken and spinach to pasta and stir in pesto
5. Add cheese if desired and more salt/pepper as needed
